description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Classic arcade racing game in a flashy 80's look. The race course combines the most stunning landscapes of the world and gives you some marvellous views. Choose all characters and see how their personal stories unwined and intertwine. Listen to great music and enjoy the ride!
